title: Episode 9: Ainsley Britain
description:
Welcome to Coffee with Kailey! Each Wednesday, Kailey invites everyone to sit down and have coffee with her and her friends. As a touring wife and mother, Kailey gets to the heart of the matter with the people that matter most to her. She and her friends will catch up over a cup of coffee, sharing intimate stories of their lives. So, come share a cup and listen as they open up in this twelve episode podcast.

On today's episode, Kailey sits down her friend Ainsley Britain, certified Enneagram coach, to talk all thing life and Enneagram!

Well you heard it here first folks, my girl Ainsley just coined the phrase KDV - the Kailey Dickerson Version. Let me be clear, this is not a real translation of the Bible. This is my paraphrase attempting to recall a verse that I clearly did not have prepared for the conversation because this is real life folks!  I sure wish I was a bible scholar but I am not! So I am going to translate from the KDV to an actual translation like the ESV or NLT which are may favorite translations in the episode notes. I want to give you the right verses and give you verse addresses so you can find them too!

Remington Verses:

  • Psalm 1:3
  • Jeremiah 17:7&8
  • Exodus 12:22-27 (Reference for Anointing your House with Oil)
  • Mark 11:24 (Pray and Believe)
  • Genesis 45:8&9
  • 1 Corinthians 13:9 & 10 (See in Part, Know in Part)
  • Acts 2:17&18
  • Corinthians 3:17 (Spirit of the Lord)

Thanks to our sponsors in this episode!

Simplified Planner: To see everything Simplified has to offer and start living a simplified life today, head to EmilyLey.com and use my code, KAILEY15, for 15% off your purchase at Simplified.

Modern Fertility: Get $20 off your fertility test when you go to ModernFertility.com/kailey.

CRU: Simply text COFFEE to 71326 to help today. Imagine just how much this gift could change someone’s life! So text COFFEE to 71326 to help now or visit give.cru.org/CoffeeWithKailey. Message and data rates may apply.

Cru’s Privacy Policy – https://www.cru.org/us/en/about/privacy.html
